# style-helpers

> CSS library helpers

`npm install --save style-helpers`

## Classes list & Rules

[Enjoy here](https://louismazel.github.io/style-helpers/)

## Usage

### CSS import

```scss
@import "style-helpers";
```

### HTML import

```html
<link href="path_to_your_node_modules/style-helpers" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
```

### JS import

```js
import 'style-helpers'
```

## Dev Mode

`npm run watch`

## To compile SCSS

- Install dependency

`npm i`

- Build

`npm run build`
